# Móholt ehf. — Stafræn ráðgjöf
> Sérfræðiráðgjöf á sviði verkefnastjórnunar, málastjórnunar, reglufylgni og stafrænnar umbreytingar.

## About
Móholt ehf. is an Icelandic consulting firm specializing in case management systems, digital transformation, ISO 27001 compliance, and AI implementation for public sector and enterprise organizations. Founded in 2003 by Bjarni Sv. Guðmundsson with 25+ years of experience.

## Services
- AI & Analytics (VP01): AI-powered solutions for case management systems, document analysis, compliance automation
- Compliance & Governance (VP02): ISO 27001 readiness, GDPR compliance, audit trail optimization
- UX & Integration (VP03): User-centered design, system integration, API gateways
- Advisory & Strategy (VP04): Strategic consulting for digital transformation
- ISO 27001 Implementation (M01): Full gap analysis to certification
- Digital Health Check (M02): Process maturity assessment and recommendations
- Project Governance (M03): PMO maturity, reporting, multi-project management

## Workshops (7 available, on-site)
- V01 Gervigreind í Raun: AI integration workshop with client scenarios
- V02 Ferlabyltingin: Process re-engineering and status optimization
- V03 Frá Núlli til Ræsingar: New process/case type design and implementation
- V04 Tímabestun: Case lifecycle timing analysis and SLA design
- V05 Gagnasögur: PowerBI dashboards and self-service analytics
- V06 Sniðmátaverksmiðjan: Document template design and automation
- V07 Skipulag úr Ringulreið: Document management and classification

## Free Assessment
Case Management Maturity Assessment: 20-question self-assessment measuring process maturity across 4 dimensions. Free, no commitment. Available at /heilsufarsmat

## Markets
Primary: Iceland (60% public sector market share via Hugvit hf. partnership)
Secondary: UK Crown Dependencies, European courts and tribunals
Technologies: GoPro Foris, Casedoc, ISO 27001, GDPR, AI/ML
